name: Space Defenders (itch) (Charlie)
description:
The untold story about Space Invaders, they never said who stroke first.

Defend your planet from the Humans and hold the line as long as you can.

CONTROLS:

[W,A,S,D] = Move and Aim Attacks

[SPACE] = Jump

[E] or [LEFT CLICK] = Attack

Developed by Carlos J. Granados
